name: Sealed World
description:
A sprawling fantasy world awaits! Welcome to Khaivarok, a land that long ago was sealed inside a great wall by the gods. It's not all bad though! Kingdoms are flourishing, people are living their lives, and nobody's woken the giant monster. Yet.

  • Make all sorts of builds - There are over 200 unique skills to learn so far. Choose a class and subclass and get wild!
  • Go Places - If you want to do quests, hunt rare monsters, or just chill, you'll never get forced down a single progression path.
  • Get Cozy - There's no pressure, no time gates or weekly caps. Take your time and smell the roses. It's all about your journey.

Sealed World is currently in development, with around 10 hours of playable content and 202 skills.

!! Sealed World is being developed by one dude in his free time. Expect updates to be slow and inconsistent. !!

Join the Sealed World Discord server!
